oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Jamison Bedding - 1956-06-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Jamison Bedding sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from June 30, 1956. Hosted by Hank Snow with announcer Dave Overton. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/524
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Maybelle Carter; Carter Sisters; Hank Snow; Justin Tubb; Old Hickory Singers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces Maybelle Carter and the Carter Sisters [continued from part 1] -- Hummingbird (Maybelle Carter, The Carter Sisters) -- Born To Be Happy (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow talks about taking a vacation -- Hank Snow introduces Justin Tubb -- Justin Tubb reads a song dedication -- You Nearly Lose Your Mind (Justin Tubb) -- Dave Overton reads an announcement -- Hank Snow introduces the Old Hickory Singers -- Oh Monah (Old Hickory Singers) -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Jamison Bedding theme (Old Hickory Singers) -- Closing statement (Dave Overton)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Overton, Dave; Snow, Hank; Old Hickory Singers; Carter, Maybelle, 1909-1978; Carter Sisters; Carter, Anita; Carter, Helen, 1927-1998; Tubb, Justin
